author: cnbc.com
title: Syncora Announces GAAP Financial Results Release for the Year Ended December 31, 2017 and Conference Call Details
text:
HAMILTON, Bermuda, March 07, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Syncora Holdings Ltd. ("SHL" or the "Company") today announced that it plans to host a conference call at 8:30 a.m. on March 28, 2018 to discuss its GAAP financial results for the year ended December 31, 2017. A press release detailing this period will be issued after market close on March 27, 2018; at the same time the Company's consolidated GAAP financial statements for the year ended December 31, 2017, and certain additional information relating to the financial results, will be made available on Syncora's website ( www.syncora.com ).
The call will be webcast via the Investor Events page of the Investor Relations section of the Company's website at www.syncora.com . Following conclusion of the call, the Company will post a transcript on its website alongside a replay of the webcast that will be available through 11:59 p.m. ET on April 28, 2018.
About Syncora Holdings Ltd.
Syncora Holdings Ltd. (OTC:SYCRF) is a Bermuda-domiciled holding company. Further information can be found on www.syncora.com .
